alert.note: Alert for Coastal Dixie; Coastal Jefferson; Coastal Taylor; Coastal Wakulla (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued March 17 at 4:01PM EDT until March 18 at 3:00AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM EDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Minor coastal flooding. * WHERE...Coastal Jefferson, Coastal Wakulla, Coastal Taylor and Coastal Dixie Counties. * WHEN...Until 3 AM EDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of lots, parks, and roads with only isolated road closures expected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The main concern will be with the high tide cycle late this evening. At high tide, normally dry ground near the shoreline could experience around 2 feet of inundation.
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Dixie; Coastal Jefferson; Coastal Taylor; Coastal Wakulla
